title: Estimates for the numerical radius and the spectral radius of the Frobenius companion matrix and bounds for the zeros of polynomials
abstract: We apply numerical radius and spectral radius estimates to the Frobenius companion matrices of monic polynomials to derive new bounds for their zeros and give dierent proofs of some known bounds.
